snippet: After intense criticism, the New York Public Library abandoned its renovation proposal for a more modest, cheaper and smarter plan.
abstract: Editorial welcomes New York Public Library's decision to abandon its plan to renovate its landmark building in Midtown, opting instead for a more modest, cheaper, quicker and smarter plan; contends library's reversal was motivated by the best of reasons.
lead_paragraph: After intense criticism, the New York Public Library abandoned its renovation proposal for a more modest, cheaper and smarter plan.
